DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether preoperative abdominal imaging use either CT angiogram ( CTA ) , MR angiogram ( MRA ) impact perforator dissection time , cost , patient outcome DIEP flap breast reconstruction .
DOC.brief_title: Preoperative Imaging DIEP Flap Breast Reconstruction
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospectively compare clinical , economic patient outcome preoperative image use either CTA MRA preoperative imaging patient undergoing deep inferior epigastric perforator ( DIEP ) flap breast reconstruction . Subjects randomly undergo either CTA scan MRA scan , scan ( control ) preoperatively . An operative plan base perforator size course devise interventional radiologist plastic surgeon . The DIEP flap procedure plan control . Subjects tell operative plan change intraoperatively . Flap dissection time change operative plan record intraoperatively surgeon stress evaluate follow surgery . Pain narcotic use evaluate preoperatively day 1-4 postoperatively . The Breast-Q complete preoperatively 3 week , 3 month 12 month postoperatively . Groups compare term variable measure .
